reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 181/00: TAX MATTERS - DEADLINE FOR 2000 UPPER-TIER RATING BY-LAWS
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — DEADLINE FOR 2000 UPPER-TIER RATING BY-LAWS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 181/00: TAX MATTERS - DEADLINE FOR 2000 UPPER-TIER RATING BY-LAWS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. April 30, 2000 is the last date on which an upper-tier rating by-law for 2000 may be passed under subsection 366 (2) or (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 181/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. April 30, 2000 is the last date on which an upper-tier rating by-law for 2000 may be passed under subsection 366 (2) or (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 181/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 181/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 181/00, s. 2.
